title: Russia Looks to Private Militia to Secure a Victory in Eastern Ukraine
description: Wagner Group forces launched attacks from several directions on the city of Bakhmut, though analysts said seizing it would yield little strategic value.
dc:creator: Andrew Higgins and Matthew Mpoke Bigg

media:content.media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Civilians on Saturday crossed what remained of a bridge that had been bombarded by Russia in Bakhmut in Ukraineâ€™s Donetsk region.
